Review Text: (Translated by Google) Always delicious sushi, but always annoyed me with the five different cards they had. This has been changed recently and now I enjoy it. Delicious sushi, fast service and a very reasonable price. ‚Ä¶

Name: Otaru
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Delicious sushi and good service! One of the better sushi tents in Amsterdam. Not the common sushi that you see at other sushi tents. Price / quality ratio is fine. Fun fact for fans of Dutch celebrities: Arie Boomsma ‚Ä¶

Name: Otaru
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Great sushi, great service. You can really eat sushi much better here than in those all you can eat tents ‚Ä¶

Name: Otaru
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Just spent for 54.20. Once home I missed 2 things and 2 things were wrong. After calling several times and not being reached, I was able to come back to exchange it. Asked for a voucher for next time but that was not ‚Ä¶

Name: Otaru
Review Text: (Translated by Google) It is perfect for Koreans. It's a choice you won't regret. It was so delicious that I went twice. The staff are friendly and the price is not expensive, so it is the best! I recommend it! ‚Ä¶

Name: Otaru
Review Text: (Translated by Google) The sushi is original and refines taste. The price quality ratio is great. Certainly better than an All you from eat restaurant. ‚Ä¶

Name: Otaru
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Not the best sushi in town, not the nicest place in town, but it still tastes me every time I am here. ‚Ä¶

Name: Otaru
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Tasty and the price is not great. The delivery is very fast. Thank you. ‚Ä¶

Name: Otaru

Name: Otaru
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Have been coming here for years and have not found a better place to eat sushi in the same price range. Delicious! ‚Ä¶

Name: Otaru
Review Text: (Translated by Google) It's perfect for Korean tastes, and the speed of food is just right. A completely Korean style Japanese restaurant. The Hong Kong boss is awesome. The liver can be a little strong, so tell me in advance ‚Ä¶
